channel.title: Adding Packet 93
channel.description:
Hey,
I need to add packet 93 on my RSPS. I have [code]private final static int INTERFACE_ON_SKILL = 93;[/code] in WorldPacketsDecoder, and I set the packet size at 1.
I know I need to add something along this:
[code]else if (packetId == INTERFACE_ON_SKILL) { What do I add here? }[/code]
What would I add in the middle part of the code for this specific packet. Packet 93 has to do with the updated skill interfaces. (I.E when you smelt bars, craft gems, or fletch bows, the images don't show on the interfaces.)

item.title: Adding Packet 93
